# cancel()

**Instance Method**

Cancel the wait for the set of attribute path/value pairs represented by this MTRAttributeValueWaiter.  If the completion has not been called yet, it will becalled with MTRErrorCodeCancelled.

## Declaration

```swift
func cancel()
```
title: cancel()
